case_name_full: The People of the State of New York v. Peter Van Alphen, Appellant The People of the State of New York v. Michael Didden

opinions.opinion_text: Judgment of the County Court of Richmond county convicting defendants of the crime of rape in the first degree and assault in the second degree, and order denying motions for a new trial and for other relief, unanimously affirmed pursuant to the provisions of section 542 of the Code of Criminal Procedure. No opinion. Present — Lazansky, P. J., Hagarty, Carswell, Davis and Adel, JJ.

court_short_name: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of New York
court_full_name: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York
